El Corte Ingles Logo El Corte Inglés S.A., headquartered in Madrid, is the biggest department store group in Europe and ranks third worldwide. El Corte Inglés is Spain’s only remaining department store chain. Source
You can download theEl Corte Ingleslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: El Corte Ingles
item.description: El Corte Inglés S.A., headquartered in Madrid, is the biggest department store group in Europe and ranks third worldwide. El Corte Inglés is Spain’s only remaining department store chain. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Harrods Logo
Harrods Limited is a department store located on Brompton Road in Knightsbridge, London, England. It is owned by the state of Qatar via its sovereign wealth fund, the Qatar Investment Authority. The Harrods brand also applies to other enterprises undertaken by the Harrods group of companies including Harrods Estates, Harrods Aviation and Air Harrods. The store occupies a 5-acre site and has 330 departments covering 1.1 million sq ft of retail space.
You can download theHarrodslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Harrods
item.description: Harrods Limited is a department store located on Brompton Road in Knightsbridge, London, England. It is owned by the state of Qatar via its sovereign wealth fund, the Qatar Investment Authority. The Harrods brand also applies to other enterprises undertaken by the Harrods group of companies including Harrods Estates, Harrods Aviation and Air Harrods. The store occupies a 5-acre site and has 330 departments covering 1.1 million sq ft of retail space.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kmart Logo
Kmart Corporation is an American big box department store chain headquartered in Hoffman Estates, Illinois, United States. The company was incorporated in 1899 as S. S. Kresge Corporation and renamed Kmart Corporation in 1977. The first store with the Kmart name opened in 1962. At its peak in 1994, Kmart operated 2,486 stores globally, including 2,323 discount stores and Super Kmart Center locations in the United States. From 2005 through 2019, Kmart was a subsidiary of Sears Holdings Corporation and is now a subsidiary of Transform SR Brands LLC.
You can download theKmartlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Kresge Corporation and renamed Kmart Corporation in 1977. The first store with the Kmart name opened in 1962. At its peak in 1994, Kmart operated 2,486 stores globally, including 2,323 discount stores and Super Kmart Center locations in the United States. From 2005 through 2019, Kmart was a subsidiary of Sears Holdings Corporation and is now a subsidiary of Transform SR Brands LLC.
